===Etymology===
From {{der|ja|pt|sort=おらんだ|Holanda||[[Holland]]}}<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJS">{{R:Daijisen}}</ref><ref name="KJE">{{R:Kojien}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>. Note that some sources<ref name="KDJ"></ref><ref name="KJE"></ref><ref name="DJR"></ref> give the inaccurate {{etyl|pt|-}} source spelling as ''[[Olanda]]'', likely because the {{etyl|pt|-}} ''h'' is silent.

The spelling is an example of phonetic {{ateji}}.
